00043 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00044 {
00045     if(argc < 3)
00046     {
00047         printUsage();
00048         exit(1);
00049     }
00050 
00051     // check command option
00052     if(strcmp(argv[1], "--encode") != 0)
00053     {
00054         cerr << "unknown command option " << argv[1] << endl;
00055         printUsage();
00056         exit(1);
00057     }
00058 
00059     Knowledge::EncodeType encode = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(argv[2]);
00060     if(encode == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00061     {
00062         cerr << "unknown encode type " << argv[2] << endl;
00063         printUsage();
00064         exit(1);
00065     }
00066 
00067     // create factory
00068     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00069 
00070     // create analyzer and knowledge
00071     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00072     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00073 
00074     // set dictionary files
00075     string sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00076     string userdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_USER_DICT;
00077     if(encode == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP)
00078     {
00079         sysdict += "/../bin_eucjp";
00080     }
00081     else if(encode == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS)
00082     {
00083         sysdict += "/../bin_sjis";
00084     }
00085     else if(encode == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8)
00086     {
00087         sysdict += "/../bin_utf8";
00088     }
00089 
00090     // load dictioanry files
00091     cout << "system dictionary: " << sysdict << endl;
00092     cout << "user dictionary: " << userdict << endl;
00093     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict.c_str());
00094     knowledge->addUserDict(userdict.c_str());
00095     if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00096     {
00097         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00098         exit(1);
00099     }
00100     cout << "encoding type of system dictionary: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(knowledge->getEncodeType()) << endl;
00101 
00102     // set knowledge
00103     if(analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge) == 0)
00104     {
00105         cerr << "fail to set knowledge" << endl;
00106         exit(1);
00107     }
00108 
00109     // analyze string
00110     const char* str = "abc";
00111     cout << "input: " << str << endl;
00112     cout << "output: " << analyzer->runWithString(str) << endl;
00113 
00114     delete knowledge;
00115     delete analyzer;
00116 
00117     return 0;
00118 }
